document_data.caption: A map showing Piatran's Clothiers (labeled #5) on Weeping Maiden's Run.
document_data.name: Piatran's Clothiers
document_data.mainbody: '''Piatran's Clothiers''' was a shop located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The building stood a single story tall.
document_data.Location: Piatran's Clothiers was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]] within the [[Waterdeep/Adventurers' Quarter|Adventurers' Quarter]] on the east side of [[Weeping Maiden's Run]] directly behind [[Madame Garah's Boarding House]] and [[Amrani's Laundry]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Adventurers' Quarter}}
document_data.Inhabitants: As its name implied, the shop was owned and run by [[Piatran]] in the {{YearlinkName|1372}}.
